This sorting can only be used when you share your online-status. 
 
Note: Sharing your online status will share it for all Niantic games you play.

general1.ticket.2_description:
A ticket to access the What You Choose to Be Special Research on August 14 and 15, 2021, from 11:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time each day, wherever you are. Details can be found in the in-game News.

YOU MUST PLAY DURING THE SPECIFIED TIME TO RECEIVE ALL THE SPECIAL EVENT BONUSES.
general1.ticket.2_eevet_description:
A ticket to access the What You Choose to Be Special Research on August 14 and 15, 2021, from 11:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time each day, wherever you are. Details can be found in the in-game News.

YOU MUST PLAY DURING THE SPECIFIED TIME TO RECEIVE ALL THE SPECIAL EVENT BONUSES.
general1.ticket.2_eevet_title: What You Choose to Be Ticket
general1.ticket.2_oshat_description:
A ticket to access the "From Scalchops to Seamitars" Special Research from September 19, 2021, at 11:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time, wherever you are. Details can be found in the in-game News.

 YOU MUST PLAY DURING THE SPECIFIED TIME TO RECEIVE ALL THE SPECIAL EVENT BONUSES.
general1.ticket.2_title: What You Choose to Be Ticket
incubatorsuper.1_description: A more powerful Egg Incubator that helps Eggs hatch quickly. Breaks after 3 uses.
item_event_ticket_pink_desc: A ticket to access Special Research on August 14 and 15, 2021, from 11:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time each day, wherever you are.
item_event_ticket_pink_details: This ticket will automatically activate to give you access to Special Research on August 14 and 15, 2021, wherever you are.
item_event_ticket_pink_eevet_desc: A ticket to access Special Research on August 14 and 15, 2021, from 11:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time each day, wherever you are.
item_event_ticket_pink_eevet_details: This ticket will automatically activate to give you access to Special Research on August 14 and 15, 2021, wherever you are.
item_event_ticket_pink_oshat_desc: A ticket to access a special research on September 19, 2021 from 11:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time, wherever you are.
item_event_ticket_pink_oshat_details: This ticket will automatically activate to give you access to a special research on September 19, 2021, wherever you are in the world.
item_leader_map_fragment_desc: When you defeat a Team GO Rocket Grunt, you can get a Mysterious Component. Collect six Mysterious Components to combine them!
leader_map_assembled_description: Your Mysterious Components have combined into a Rocket Radar! Use it to locate Team GO Rocket Hideouts.

photobomb_five_oshawott: 5 Photobombs from Oshawott in GO Snapshot
poi_close_toast: This PokéStop will close at {0: hh:mm tt}
poi_contrib_edit_category_added: {0} more category submission(s) will be added tomorrow.

poi_contrib_upload_later_msg: When you are ready to upload, please go to Main menu page.
poi_contrib_upload_now_msg: You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
poi_power_g_level: Thank you for your contributions! You and other Trainers can get bonuses at this Gym.
poi_power_g_level_body: Thank you for your contribution! You and other Trainers can get bonuses at this Gym.
poi_power_mainmenu: When you’re ready to upload your scan, please go to the main menu.
poi_power_p_level: Thank you for your contributions! You and nearby trainers can get a bonus from this PokeStop.
poi_power_p_level_body: Thank you for your contribution! You and other Trainers can get bonuses at this PokéStop.
poi_power_turorial_1: If you scan this PokéStop or add a photo, PokeStop points will increase. When it levels up it will provide more bonuses depending on its level.
poi_power_turorial_2: When you level up a PokeStop, you can get these bonus and benefits.
poi_power_turorial_7: When you visit the location with your buddy and spin the Photo disk, your buddy gets a heart!
poi_power_turorial_8: At a PokéStop, wild Pokémon will appear more frequently. At a Gym, you’ll have bonus Premier Balls in the Pokémon encounter after you win a Raid Battle.
poi_power_tutorial_1: If you scan this location or add a photo, the location will gain location points. When the location is powered up, it will provide bonuses depending on its level.
poi_power_tutorial_2: Power up a location to get these bonuses.
poi_power_tutorial_7: When you spin the location’s Photo Disc while your buddy is walking with you, your buddy will get a heart!
poi_power_tutorial_8: At a PokéStop, wild Pokémon will appear more frequently. At a Gym, you’ll have bonus Premier Balls in the Pokémon encounter after you win a Raid Battle.
poi_power_upload_point: Total of {0} location point(s) added to a PokéStop or Gym
pokemon_desc_0869_vanilla_cream: When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat them to berries it's decorated with cream.
pokestop_spin_new_xp_ten: 10× XP for visiting PokéStops for the first time
pokestop_spin_new_xp_three: 3× XP for visiting PokéStops for the first time
pups_tutorial_p0_body: If you scan a location, its location points will increase. When the location is powered up, it’ll provide bonuses to nearby Trainers depending on its level.
pups_tutorial_p1_body: Get bonuses from powered-up PokéStops and Gyms! Each level has different bonuses.
pups_tutorial_p2_body: While spinning a Photo Disc at a PokéStop or Gym, stop the Photo Disc where it started to add a location point!
pups_tutorial_p3_body: With this feature, you can scan PokéStops and Gyms by walking around their real-world locations and recording videos with your smart device. These scans will contribute to the creation of 3D maps of those locations.
quest_gofest_2021_dialogue_energetic_6_2: I can’t wait to hear what sort of dynamic it brings to the band’s sound!
quest_special_dialogue_bidoof_branch_que: Bidoof isn’t just cute to look at—it’s more agile and active than it appears! Nothing can perturb it, making it an excellent member of your team.
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_0_1: Not sure if you’ve noticed, but there seems to be a huge influx of Eevee, the Evolution Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_0_2: Some theorize that the key to the mysteries of Pokémon Evolution lies within Eevee’s genetics.
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_0_3: I can understand that hypothesis—after all, Eevee can evolve into EIGHT Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_0_4: I sure wish I were as adaptable as Eevee!
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_0_5: I don’t even have eight different outfits. I basically wear this lab coat all the time—even to formal events!
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_0_6: Anyway, perhaps by researching Eevee, we’ll unravel even more mysteries of Pokémon Evolution!
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_0_7: I can’t wait to get started! Let’s GO learn about Eevee!
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_1_0: Great work with your research on Eevee, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_1_1: According to my findings, Eevee’s irregular DNA gives it the ability to evolve into many different Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_1_2: For example, it has three Evolutions originally discovered in the Kanto region: the Water-type Vaporeon, the Electric-type Jolteon, and the Fire-type Flareon.
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_1_3: Isn’t it fascinating that Eevee can evolve into Pokémon of such different types?
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_1_4: As you work on your Eevee research, perhaps you might learn more about these Pokémon. Good luck!
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_2_0: Great work, %PLAYERNAME%! I see you’ve gotten a Vaporeon, a Jolteon, and a Flareon!
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_2_1: These incredible creatures are capable of some impressive feats.
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_2_2: Did you know that Vaporeon can melt away into water?
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_2_3: Or that Jolteon can blast out 10,000-volt lightning bolts?
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_2_4: And that Flareon breathes fire that is over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit?
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_2_5: Isn’t it amazing that all three of these Pokémon evolve from Eevee?
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_2_6: Perhaps there’s something besides genetics that gives Eevee so much potential.
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_2_7: Let’s do some more research to learn more about Eevee. At certain times of the day, this Pokémon can evolve into Pokémon originally discovered in the Johto region: the Psychic-type Espeon and the Dark-type Umbreon.
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_2_8: If you keep up your research, you might find them as well!
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_3_0: Great work, %PLAYERNAME%! Looks like you’ve gotten yourself an Espeon and an Umbreon!
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_3_1: The Psychic-type Espeon can use the fine hair on its body to sense air currents and predict its enemies’ next move. It usually evolves from Eevee during the daytime.
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_3_2: As for the Dark-type Umbreon, it evolves from Eevee during the nighttime. It’s said that Umbreon’s rings glow yellow under the full moon.
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_3_3: Who would’ve thought that something like the time of day could affect Pokémon Evolution!
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_3_4: It’s wonderful to delve even deeper into the mysteries of Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_3_5: Let’s keep it up by researching Eevee’s Evolutions that were originally discovered in the Sinnoh region.
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_3_6: The Grass-type Leafeon and Ice-type Glaceon seem to have evolved in order to adapt to their environment.
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_3_7: Why don’t you research these Pokémon next?
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_4_1: I see you’ve managed to get a Leafeon and a Glaceon! Congratulations!
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_4_2: The vastly different environments in the Sinnoh region appear to have caused the adaptable Eevee to evolve into a Grass-type Pokémon and an Ice-type Pokémon. It’s inspiring to see how resilient this little Pokémon can be!
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_4_3: We might not uncover all the secrets of Pokémon Evolution today, but I think we can learn a lot about ourselves through Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_4_4: Researching Eevee today has taught me there are so many paths in life to choose from.
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_4_5: I hope that Eevee can inspire you to find the one that suits you best.
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_4_6: But enough of this professor’s ramblings. Eevee is known to have just one more Evolution—the Fairy-type Sylveon, which was originally discovered in the Kalos region.
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_4_7: This Pokémon has ribbonlike feelers that it uses to calm others. Sylveon evolves from Eevee when it reaches a certain level of friendship and trust with its beloved Trainer. Knowing that almost brings a tear to my eye!
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_4_8: I hope you have the good fortune of crossing paths with a wonderful Pokémon like Sylveon sometime soon.
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_0_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! I came across a truly surprising sight recently while going for a walk—trees in the nearby forest were covered with slash marks!
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_0_1: I’ve heard of a Pokémon called Oshawott, the Sea Otter Pokémon, that can detach the scalchop on its stomach for use as a blade. Maybe the slash marks were caused by all of the Oshawott nearby?
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_0_2: Let's use this as an opportunity to go and catch some of those Oshwott so we can find out more!
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_1_0: Hey %PLAYERNAME%! Did you know that Oshawott doesn't just use the scalchop on its stomach to fight, but that it can be used to break open hard berries as well?
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_1_1: Maybe we can learn even more about Oshawott once it evolves into its next Evolution: Dewott! Don’t let its cute exterior fool you—Dewott takes itself very seriously.
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_1_2: Also known as the Discipline Pokémon, this little fella uses strict training to learn its flowing double-scalchop technique. I’d love to see Dewott’s fighting in action!
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_2_0: Wow, Dewott's double-scalchop technique is amazing! Aren’t Pokémon so curious, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_2_1: I barely have the coordination to rub my tummy and pat my head at the same time and we have creatures that have their own special battle techniques. Truly inspiring stuff!
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_2_2: I’m starting to understand a bit more about this Pokémon now. And I have an inkling that we’ll get to learn even more soon!
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_2_3: It’s Evolution, Samurott, apparently uses swords incorporated in its armor called seamitars. Apparently in the time it takes a foe to blink, it can draw and sheathe the seamitars attached to its front legs.
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_2_4: Sounds like it’s a true master of its craft! No wonder it’s known as the Formidable Pokémon! Let’s evolve Dewott and see this mastery for ourselves, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_3_0: Well would you look at that, %PLAYERNAME%, a Samurott in the flesh! It’s seamitars truly are a sight to behold. Knowing it can draw and sheathe its blades in a blink of an eye, I wonder how fast it can dice up berries...
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_3_1: Thanks for all your help today, %PLAYERNAME%. We’ve learned so much about Oshawott, Dewott, and Samurott—and from them too! I’ll SEA you next time! Ha-ha!
quest_special_dialogue_season4_0_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! I’m glad you’re here. A new adventure is about to begin!
quest_special_dialogue_season4_0_1: Not long ago, various Legendary Pokémon began emerging from mysterious rings that suddenly appeared in the sky. After some research, we discovered it was Hoopa, the Mischief Pokémon, that was responsible.
quest_special_dialogue_season4_0_2: Hoopa’s rings allow it to teleport things—including itself—wherever it wants. That power makes it hard to track down, but for some reason, Hoopa seems to keep returning to this area.
quest_special_dialogue_season4_0_3: How do I know? Well, I was doing some lab work recently when my glasses were lifted straight off my head. Spark was there assisting me, and he said he saw a small, lavender-colored hand emerge from a ring and snatch my glasses. Pretty bold, eh?
quest_special_dialogue_season4_0_4: Luckily, he and Candela managed to retrieve my spectacles by chasing down the rings that were popping up at random around my mobile lab. So, at least I can still see. Haha!
quest_special_dialogue_season4_0_5: Needless to say, I’m still not sure why Hoopa’s here. Tracking it down has been difficult, but with your help, I’m sure we’ll crack the case in no time!
quest_special_dialogue_season4_0_6: For now, why don’t you try using an Incense to see what Pokémon you can find in the area?
quest_special_dialogue_season4_1_0: As with all great mysteries, solving this will take time, patience, and trust. I’ll need to work alone at some points, but I promise I’ll return to share my findings and help propel us forward.
quest_special_dialogue_season4_1_1: You just keep exploring the world as you always do. You never know what you might find!
quest_special_dialogue_season4_1_2: I’ll report back here once I have more information on Hoopa. Thanks in advance for your help, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_swabt_0_3: The first few times I saw it, I thought my eyes were playing tricks on me, but as the motions grew more frequent, I began to suspect a Pokémon was involved.
quest_special_dialogue_tcg1_0_1: I was just thinking that it’d be interesting to research more about my Buddy Pokémon and the team leaders’ buddies.
quest_special_dialogue_tcg1_2_0: Excellent work, %PLAYERNAME%. It looks like you have your very own Lapras, just like Blanche!
quest_under_investigation: Professor Willow is currently performing an investigation regarding this research. Check back for more details soon!
quest_use_any_potion: Use any Potion on a Pokémon
quest_use_hyper_potion: Use a Hyper Potion on a Pokémon
quest_use_max_potion: Use a Max Potion on a Pokémon
quest_use_super_potion: Use a Super Potion on a Pokémon
safari_2020_dialogue_1_2a: Why not take the time to bond with your buddy?
spawn_eevee: More Eevee are appearing in the wild
spawn_oshawott: More Oshawott are appearing in the wild
ticket_eevee: Tickets for an exclusive Special Research story available in the shop
ticket_oshawott: Ticket for Special Research story available in the Shop: From Scalchops to Seamitars
tips_battle_at_gyms_tutorial_body: You can claim a Gym controlled by a rival team by defeating the Pokémon in the Gym. If you reduce the motivation of all Pokémon in the Gym to zero, you’ll be able to claim the Gym for your team.
tips_gym_pokecoins_tutorial_body:
Earn up to 50 PokéCoins per day when your Pokémon defends a Gym.

You’ll earn these PokéCoins when your Pokémon returns from defending the Gym.
tips_loading_screen_battle_switch_charge: Switch out Pokémon during battle to utilize your Battle Party’s different Charged Attacks.
tips_loading_screen_curveball_chance: A Curveball Throw will increase your chances of catching a Pokémon.
tips_loading_screen_discard_all_items: Quickly discard your entire stock of any one item in your Item Bag by tapping the − button on the discard screen.
tips_loading_screen_evolve_knocked_out: When you evolve a Pokémon that’s been knocked out in battle, that Pokémon will automatically return to full health.
tips_loading_screen_friendship_lucky_egg: Use a Lucky Egg to double the XP you earn by increasing your Friendship level with other Trainers.
tips_loading_screen_golden_razz_gym: Feeding a Golden Razz Berry to a Pokémon defending a Gym will fully heal that Pokémon.
tips_loading_screen_raid_egg_hatch: It’s common for Trainers to challenge difficult raids the moment the Raid Egg hatches.
tips_loading_screen_raid_party_prep: Prepare a Battle Party in advance to lock in your strategy before challenging a Raid Boss.
tips_potion_revive_tutorial_intro_0: Looks like your Pokémon fainted. Here are some Potions and Revives that you can use to restore your Pokémon’s HP.
tips_potion_revive_tutorial_intro_1: To use these items, open your Item Bag. Hope you find them helpful, {0}! Let’s take care of our Pokémon, just like they take care of us.
tips_potion_revive_tutorial_outro_0: Collect more Potions and Revives by winning Raid Battles and spinning Photo Discs at PokéStops and Gyms!
tips_potion_tutorial_0: Your work doesn’t stop there. You should get your Pokémon to full HP!
tips_potion_tutorial_1: You can use Potions to restore the HP of your Pokémon.
tips_potion_tutorial_2: When using Potions, tap on a Pokémon to restore its HP.
tips_potion_tutorial_3: Just like new! Seeing a Pokémon feel better is one of my favorite things.
tips_potion_tutorial_select_item_toast: Use your Potions to restore the HP of your Pokémon.
tips_potion_tutorial_use_item_toast: Tap on a Pokémon to restore its HP.
tips_raid_tutorial_charged_attack_body: Once your attack meter is full, tap the button to perform a Charged Attack, which can deal a lot of damage.
tips_raid_tutorial_difficulty_body:
The icon indicates a raid’s difficulty. Work with other Trainers to defeat more challenging Raid Bosses!

If you defeat a Mega Raid Boss, you’ll get Mega Energy that you can use to Mega Evolve that Pokémon.
tips_raid_tutorial_dodge_body: Swipe to the left or right to dodge incoming attacks from the opponent.
tips_revive_tutorial_0: Use a Revive on a fainted Pokémon to restore half its maximum HP.
tips_revive_tutorial_select_item_toast: Use Revives to revive fainted Pokémon.
tips_revive_tutorial_use_item_toast: Tap on your fainted Pokémon to help revive them.
tips_tagging_tutorial_body_0: As your Pokémon collection grows, try using tags to easily categorize and sort your Pokémon based on specific characteristics.
tips_tagging_tutorial_body_1: Here are some examples of ways you can utilize tags.
two_free_raid_passes: Up to two free Raid Passes per day by spinning Gym Photo Discs
ultra_unlock_event_name_sword_shield: Ultra Unlock Part 3: Sword and Shield

username_suggestion_disclaimer_new_user: You can change your nickname later.

wayfarer_eligible_body: Congratulations! You’ve become eligible for Niantic Wayfarer, a program that allows you to enhance Niantic games by contributing information on unique and interesting places in the world around you. Complete the Wayfarer tutorial to unlock PokéStop nomination and editing features.
wayfarer_eligible_unlock_msg: Complete the Wayfarer tutorial to unlock!
